name: Slug Shot
help:
Delivers an attack to target.
Combo Action: Split Shot or Heated Split Shot
Combo Potency: 1,000
Gauss Barrel Effect: Increases Heat Gauge by 5

※Action changes to Heated Slug Shot when executed while a Gauss Barrel is attached and the Heat Gauge is 50 or higher.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
